description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The sequal to Finish. Finish 2: Colors offers new levels and a whole different way to play. Use A,B,X,Y to control your colors and reach each mark. Test your skills.
